plugins.name: Cya CDN
plugins.description:
Cya CDN


Cya CDN is a Figma plugin designed to simplify the process of uploading selected nodes to a CDN or Cloud Server and retrieving the corresponding remote URL. When a node is successfully uploaded, the plugin automatically caches the CDN URL within the node, allowing anyone with access to the Figma file to easily retrieve and share the URL.


I provided an API example at github, you can fork this repo and run it at local to upload assets!


Github: cya-cdn-upload-server


Before you can use this plugin, you need to provide some configuration in the plugin setting page, the configuration is listed below:


1. TinyPNG API Key

2. CDN Prefix Path

3. CDN Upload URL

4. Image Scale


TinyPNG API Key


If you want to compress the image before upload, you should provide the TinyPNG API Key, you can get the key in the TinyPNG official website: https://tinypng.com/developers


CDN Prefix Path


This parameter is the prefix path of your CDN server, CDN Prefix Path is optional.


CDN Upload URL


You must provide the CDN upload URL, the plugin will upload the image to this URL, the URL should be like this: `https://cdn.example.com/upload`, the plugin will send a POST request to this URL, the request body is a form data, the keys is:


* file: file blob the plugin generated

* tinyAPIKey: from plugin settings

* cdnPrefixPath: from plugin settings


Example of the CDN Upload URL request:

POST https://cdn.example.com/upload

file: binaray
cdnPrefixPath: temp
tinyApiKey: Qbh0C9QSM2Z0ftBjyhydYb6sF******

# Response 
{
  "cdnUrl": "https://cdn.example.com/temp/bca484f1-7798-4b63-946a-****"
}


Example of the CDN Upload backend implementation(NextJs API):

import { NextApiHandler } from "next";
import formidable, { File } from "formidable";
import tinify from "tinify";
import fs from "fs";
import path from "path";
import OSS from "ali-oss";

export const config = {
  api: {
    bodyParser: false,
  },
};

type ApiFormData = {
  file: File;
  cdnPrefixPath?: string;
  tinyApiKey?: string;
};

const compressImage = async (file: File, tinyApiKey: string) => {
  tinify.key = tinyApiKey;
  const source = tinify.fromFile(file.filepath);
  await source.toFile(file.filepath);
};

const uploadImage = async (file: File, prefixPath: string) => {
  const client = new OSS({
    bucket: "xxx...",
    region: "xxx...",
    accessKeyId: "xxx...",
    accessKeySecret: "xxx...",
  });
  const result = await client.put(
    path.join(prefixPath, file.newFilename),
    file.filepath
  );
  return result.url;
};

const compressAndUpload: NextApiHandler = async (req, res) => {
  console.log("handle compress and upload request");
  const form = formidable({
    encoding: "utf-8",
  });
  const [fields, files] = await form.parse(req);
  const file = (files.file as File[])[0];
  const cdnPrefixPath = fields.cdnPrefixPath[0];
  const tinyApiKey = fields.tinyApiKey[0];
  console.log(file, cdnPrefixPath, tinyApiKey);
  if (tinyApiKey) {
    await compressImage(file, tinyApiKey);
  }
  const cdnUrl = await uploadImage(file, cdnPrefixPath || "");
  console.log(cdnUrl);
  fs.unlinkSync(file.filepath);
  return res.status(200).json({ cdnUrl });
};

export default compressAndUpload;


Tips: if you want to use this plugin, you must implement the backend API first, and then provide the API URL to the plugin.


Image Scale


Which scale you want to upload, the default value is 2x.


About the local cache


1. The plugin will cache the profile settings in local, so you don't need to provide the profile settings every time you use the plugin.

2. If the node is uploaded before, the plugin will not upload it again, it will use the cached url.


If you have any questions, please contact me: lvchenyang@baicizhan.com
plugins.tagline: Compress selected node by tinypng.com to PNG and upload it to Cloud Server.

plugins.name: Crypto Chart Lines
plugins.description:
Turn real cryptocurrency price data into beautiful vector chart lines for your designs. This plugin fetches actual historical price data and creates smooth, customized chart lines that reflect real market movements.


Features:

- Real-time price data

- Support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana

- Multiple timeframe options (24h, 1w, 1m, 1y)

- Brand-accurate colors for each cryptocurrency

- Smooth, rounded lines optimized for design

- Vector-based output for perfect scaling

- Trading platform designs

- Crypto website designs

- Price comparison visualizations

- Market analysis presentations
plugins.tagline: Generate beautiful price history visualizations for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.

plugins.name: Upi Line - SVG Downloader
plugins.description:
Description


This Figma plugin allows users to quickly export their selections as SVG files. The plugin displays a preview of the generated SVG and offers the option to download the file directly.


Features

  1. SVG Preview: Shows a preview of the current selection as an SVG.
  2. SVG Export: Allows downloading the generated SVG with one click.
  3. Multiple Selection Support: You can now select multiple elements and preview them simultaneously.
  4. Download as ZIP Archive: Download all selected SVG elements as a single ZIP archive for convenient access.


Usage

  1. Select an Element: Select an element in Figma to export as SVG.
  2. Preview: A preview of the generated SVG will be displayed in the plugin.
  3. Download: Click the "Download SVG" button to download the SVG file.
plugins.tagline: Upi Line - SVG Downloader allows users to quickly export their selections as SVG file.

plugins.name: GummyGrab (beta)
plugins.description:
Capture screenshots with the Chrome Extension and bring them into Figma without pushing a single pixel.


You can:

  • Take screenshots at any breakpoint size.
  • Bring full page shots into Figma without downsizing and pixelation issues.
  • Organize them into boards with notes and URLs.


▶️ Watch the video to see it in action.


How it Works

  1. Capture from the Chrome Extension.
  2. Drop your files into Figma.
  3. Select files and run the plugin.


Great for:

Ad hoc screenshots • Product audits • Competitor evaluations • Expert reviews • Mood boards • QA reviews


While in beta, everything is free! 🧸

A paid version is on its way – consider it my peace offering to my lovely wife for all the time GummyGrab stole from our post-toddler bedtime hours.


And don't worry, GummyGrab will always offer a free version.


Features

Chrome extension

  • Size shots
  • Create boards
  • Add notes
  • Save URLs
  • Avoid pixelation
  • Keyboard accessible


Figma plugin

  • Resizes shots from 2x → 1x
  • Arranges shots
  • Attaches notes and URLs
  • Stitches split shots


Get stared

Install the GummyGrab Chrome extension


FAQ

1. Are there keyboard shortcuts?

Chrome extension:

  • Open the extension using Ctrl + 9 (Mac) or Ctrl+Shift+9 (Windows).
  • Use tab, up/down, and enter keys to navigate the extension.

Figma plugin:

  • Run the plugin with an App shortcut. For the Mac desktop app, set it up by navigating to: System Settings > Keyboard > Keyboard Shortcuts > App Shortcuts > Plus icon > Select Figma for Application > Input the following into Menu Title: Plugins->GummyGrab (beta) > Assign shortcut keys.


2. Why does GummyGrab use local file downloads?

  • Speed: Fast integration into Figma, as it cuts out server imports.
  • Convenience: You don’t need to operate another UI in Figma, just simply run the plug-in.
  • Cost-effective: No extra charges for you due to server storage.


3. What are the available breakpoint sizes?

  • Set custom widths from 320px to 3024px. Wider sizes can vary based on the size of your computer screen.
  • Alternatively, capture at your browser's current width without setting a size.


4. How do I get the best from GummyGrab?

  • For wider screenshots, keep your browser window to the left side of your screen.
  • When capturing screens of 500px to 768px wide, try to have fewer tabs open.


5. What does the “Avoid pixelation” feature do?

  • It splits long screenshots into smaller ones to prevent them from being downsized by Figma. The Figma plugin automatically stitches the shots back together, resulting in high-quality images. Note that wider widths of 2048px and over may still experience some pixelation.


6. Does GummyGrab store user data?

  • GummyGrab processes all data locally and doesn't collect, store, or sell any user data.


7. Why does the GummyGrab Chrome Extension request permissions during installation?

  • GummyGrab requires access to your downloads to transfer files to your computer. It also needs access to your URLs to capture mobile-sized screenshots. Rest assured, it only uses these permissions for your screenshots - no 🧢.


For help, visit the Help page.


To get stared, install the GummyGrab Chrome extension. .

plugins.name: Gradient Mirror
plugins.description:
GradientMirror is a Figma plugin designed to simplify the process of reversing gradients within your designs. With GradientMirror, you can quickly invert the order of colors in your gradients, allowing for easy adjustment and experimentation.


Simply select the layers containing gradients, run the plugin, and watch as GradientMirror mirrors your gradients instantly. Whether you're fine-tuning a single gradient or managing multiple gradients within a layer, GradientMirror provides an intuitive solution to streamline your design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Easily reverse gradients in Figma

plugins.name: Zen Keys
plugins.description:
Zen Keys is a plugin that extends the Quick Actions menu to provide more keyboard accessibility for Figma features that don't have dedicated shortcuts. Spend less time reaching for your mouse and lean into Figma zen mode with keyboard actions:

  1. Make: Create shapes, set size, and fill
  2. Style: Set fill, stroke, corner radius of objects
  3. Resize: Resize objects
  4. Auto Layout: set the auto layout direction of a frame
  5. Go To: Quickly navigate the canvas
  6. Variables: Copy and paste variables or collections between files including all dependent aliases and collections. Refactor variables quickly by replacing all instances with another variable and marking the original as deprecated or deleting it entirely.
plugins.tagline: Extended quick actions and tools for managing variables/collections

plugins.name: SVG to Jetpack Compose Icon
plugins.description:
SVG to Jetpack Compose Icon is a powerful Figma plugin that converts vector graphics directly into Jetpack Compose ImageVector code. It's designed for Android and Kotlin Multiplatform developers who want to seamlessly integrate their Figma designs into Compose projects.

The plugin preserves all vector properties including colors, strokes, and complex paths while generating clean, production-ready Kotlin code. With features like debug mode and preview composables, it streamlines the workflow between designers and developers.


Key features:

  1. One-click conversion from SVG to Compose
  2. Maintains design fidelity with pixel-perfect accuracy
  3. Generates properly formatted Kotlin code
  4. Works with Compose Multiplatform
  5. Includes preview composables
  6. Debug mode for troubleshooting


Whether you're working on Android apps or cross-platform projects with Compose Multiplatform, this plugin helps bridge the gap between design and development, saving hours of manual vector conversion work.
plugins.tagline: Powerful plugin that converts vector graphics directly into Jetpack Compose ImageVector code.

plugins.name: Translator
plugins.description:
This is a plugin that creates translation and store templates.

✍️ Blog : How to use Figma translator plugin


🐾 Features

  1. Translate : Translates all strings in the selected frame using Google Translator.
  2. Create Templates : Create android and ios store templates.
  3. Change Fonts : You can change the font of a specific object.


🐾 Translate

  • To be translated, the frame name must contain a language code.
  • It uses Google Translator and has an internal caching function implemented.
  • Some languages have a feature that changes the font when translating.
  • If you use the Auto Size function, the font size is automatically reduced even if the characters become longer after translation, so you can keep the number of lines constant. (For the auto size function to work, the height of the text must not be fixed.)


🐾 Create Templates

  • The frame name is created according to the folder structure supported by fastlane.
  • After exporting the template, you can easily place it in the fastlane folder using the rsync command.
  • Supports Android and iOS store essential device templates.


🐾 Change Fonts

  • Even if a different font is used within one text node, you can only change the font you want.


Enjoy :)
plugins.tagline: Easily translate into multiple languages and create store templates.

plugins.name: External Forms for FigJam
plugins.description:
External forms for FigJam seamlessly integrates with FigJam to offer a simple, yet powerful, way to collect real-time feedback through a remotely accessible form.


This tool generates a public URL link for a custom form where users can create stickies and provide insights, questions, or comments, populating your FigJam boards with stickies.


Key Features:

  • Public URL for Easy Sharing: Generate a public link that you can share with anyone—no account required.
  • Automatically Create Stickies: Users fill out the form, and their stickies appear live on your FigJam board.
  • Zero Setup, Instant Results: Activate FormJam with a single click; no complex setups or API integrations needed.
  • Secure Feedback Loop: Maintain the privacy of your FigJam boards while opening up for targeted public input.


By offering an open channel for feedback, External Forms for FigJam empowers designers, project managers, and team leaders to make more informed decisions, fast-track revisions, and foster a collaborative environment like never before.


External Forms for FigJam is your go-to plugin for enhancing FigJam's collaborative capabilities with external feedback, Q&A, and comments.
plugins.tagline: Elevate Collaboration and Insight Gathering in One Easy Step with External Forms

plugins.name: Team Pando
plugins.description:
Team Pando automatically creates user flows from your product requirements. Use our Figma plugin to sync your Figma designs with every step of your Team Pando user flows.


  • You’ll never miss a step that needs designing. We’ll even import the relevant requirements into your Figma file for easy reference. No more flipping between tabs and chats, hoping you covered everything.
  • We link your designs, requirements, and flows so engineers have everything organized and at their fingertips, ready to build. No more wasting time directing teammates to the right designs.
  • We auto-generate Figma prototypes based on the user flows to show off your work.
  • Make sure everyone on the team has just what they need, just where they need it and link everyone’s work back to the most important thing: the product you’re building.


How to use:

  1. Make a free teampando.com account (don’t forget to invite the rest of your team - PMs, designers, and engineers!)
  2. Create a project, write your product requirements (or ping your PM!), and watch Team Pando turn them into a user flow.
  3. Open a Figma document and launch the Team Pando plugin.
  4. Choose the project and flow you want to work on and tap “Sync”.
  5. You’ll see a Figma frame for every step in your flow, with the relevant requirements just beneath it.
  6. Design each step as you normally would.
  7. When you’re ready, select the element in each frame that should trigger a transition (e.g. buttons) and link it to the relevant transition from your flow.
  8. Check out your auto-generated prototype and enjoy the chorus of “thank yous” from the engineers you’re working with.


We’re excited to help in any way we can. Send a message to support@teampando.com for instant help any time.

plugins.name: Fill with Excel
plugins.description:
1. If the layer name you selected matches the header name of xlsx, you can fill it in, and the plugin will automatically traverse all descendant layers. For example, if the layer name is # 123 and the header name is 123, it can be automatically filled with text and image links. The text layer can support the simultaneous filling of multiple forms, such as "# (Ethnicity) School (ID) Blood Type&Phone (Gender) Address". The layer name will be filled with "Ethnicity, School, ID, Blood Type, Phone, Gender, Address" at the same time. The content in () is a fixed value, not dynamic value filling in (). Two consecutive dynamic values need to be separated by&
  2. 你选中的图层名称和xlsx的表头名称一致，就可以进行填充，插件会自动遍历所有子孙图层。举例：图层名称为#123 表头名称为123，则可以自动进行填充，支持填充文本和图片链接。文本图层可以支持多表单同时填充，比如“#(民族)学校(身份证)血型&电话(性别)地址”，这个图层名称会同时填充“民族，学校，身份证，血型，电话，性别，地址。其中()中的内容是固定值，而不是()中的会进行动态值填充，连续的两个动态值需要用&分开
  3. https://www.yuque.com/fengchuan/ptcu5g?# 《fill with excel》 这是使用教程，包含文字填充和图片填充的教程
plugins.tagline: 从xlsx文件中，提取内容进行填充。Extract content from the xlsx file and fill it in

plugins.name: copy-layer-name
plugins.description:
"copy-layer-name" is a Figma plugin designed to significantly streamline your workflow while working in Dev Mode. This plugin was created to address the issue of the missing layer name copying function in Figma's Dev Mode.

"copy-layer-name" allows you to copy the name of the selected layer directly to your clipboard, providing an easy and swift way to transfer these names to external tools or documents without the need to manually transcribe them. This makes the work of developers and designers more productive and efficient, saving time and effort on routine tasks.


Source: https://github.com/midler/copy-layer-name

plugins.name: Layers (Jio DS)
plugins.description:
Requirements

It needs login enabled to Jio Design System Platform (DSP).


Features

🎨 Themeable Components

Instantly generate components that adapt to different themes, styles, and design tokens.

⚙️ Full Prop Control

Access and customize every component property—padding, color, typography, layout, and more.

🌗 Mode Switching

Easily toggle between light, dark, or custom modes to preview and apply different UI states.

📐 Frame Creation

Generate frames and layouts with consistent token application for seamless design system integration.

🧩 Token-Based Styling

Apply design tokens directly to components, ensuring visual consistency and scalability across your project.

🛠 Live Customization

See real-time changes as you adjust themes, tokens, and props—no need to manually restyle elements.

🧠 Smart Data Handling

Dynamic data binding for efficient style updates and easy theme switching without losing structure


How does it work?

It utilises style libraries from color palette & tokens to generate the themes. It has caching mechanism to improve how themes are applied to your designs.

Although this is blazingly fast, it is still advisable to apply a new theme on a selection and not on page for large files. Large files already consume a lot of resources and in turn slows down any change on it.


Need Help?

If you are having trouble applying theme to your designs, please write to dshelp@jio.com
plugins.tagline: Dynamic design system for Jio

plugins.name: Wordsvil - The Text Management System
plugins.description:
Wordsvil.com is made to help you and your team to organize, translate and update all text in your app and across different departments. Keep everyone on the same page.


  • Upload your text file (.csv, .json), or create it directly from your Figma file
  • Invite team members to join you in Figma or on the webapp to work with you
  • Update and sync your files through the plugin or webapp, add new languages, ensure everyone is on the same page. 
  • Export for end-products in .csv and .json. (directly API coming soon) 


How it works: 

Wordsvil.com connects your Figma text objects with your apps text files. The Figma object name will be synced with the text keys, to keep both text values the same.


  • Install the plugin, or log into the website and set up an account
  • Add a new project and use “from Figma page” if you want to start from your Figma files, or utilize the other option to start from scratch, from csv or json files. 
  • After the project is created, the plugin/webapp serves as the source of truth. 
  • Within the project, click on the menu and select Team to add collaborators to a project.


For csv follow this format. Example: 

key,notes,en,de 
welcome,,Welcome!,Willkommen!


For json follow this format. Example: 

{ "EN": { "welcome": "Welcome!",  “buy”: ”Buy now” },
  "DE": { "welcome": "Willkommen!", “buy”: ”Kauen”  }}


keywords/tags

copy, content, text, strings, writing, localization, language, translation, words, sync, translate

plugins.name: Token Mapper
plugins.description:
Token Mapper is a utility plugin that maps Figma styles to WinUI Resources for the Windows UI 3 Kit.


To start the plugin, right click anywhere on the canvas and choose "Token Mapper" from the Plugins menu. A keyboard shortcut to run the plugin is also available by pressing Ctrl + / and then typing in "Token Mapper".


Instructions:

  1. Run the Token Mapper plugin
  2. Make a selection of a WinUI 3 kit component
  3. Click on a token in the plugin to copy it to the clipboard


Tip: To "deep select" nested elements when making a selection, hold down the Ctrl key on your keyboard and then click the left mouse button.


Tip: Also, you can "walk" the selection up and down the parent-child layer tree by pressing the Shift + Enter keys or by pressing the Enter key respectively. Pressing Enter after making a selection, will "drill down" and select the nested elements if any exist.
plugins.tagline: Inspect and copy the Fluent Windows tokens used in a design

plugins.name: Smart Button Generator
plugins.description:
This Smart Button Generator enhances your design workflow by allowing you to create fully customizable buttons with robust prototyping features. It includes all the necessary settings to design interactive buttons, complete with transitions and hover effects. Key features of the plugin include:


  1. Icon Support: Easily add icons to your buttons with customizable size and positioning (left or right).


  1. Padding & Spacing: Fine-tune padding for top, bottom, left, and right, and adjust spacing between text and icons.


  1. Responsive Sizing: Choose from fixed, fill, or auto options for width and height to make your buttons adaptable to any layout.


  1. Color Customization: Define custom colors for different button states (main, hover, focus, pressed, disabled) to maintain consistency in your design system.

  3. Borders & Shadows: Customize border radius and shadow effects to add depth and emphasis to your buttons.


  1. Font Settings: Select font family, size, and weight to ensure the button’s text matches your brand's typography.


  1. Text Options: Easily toggle button text on or off with customizable content.


  1. Stroke & Color Enablement: Control stroke and color settings for enhanced visual styling.


Prototyping Features:


  1. State Transitions: Link buttons to different screens or actions based on their states, such as transitioning from normal to hover or focused, providing a dynamic experience.


  1. Interactive Prototypes: Use the plugin’s built-in prototyping tools to create smooth, clickable interactions directly within Figma, giving you full control over the button’s behavior in your prototype.


  1. Hover & Click Effects: Define specific actions triggered by hover and click, making it easy to demonstrate how buttons will behave in an interactive environment.

115596.name: Smart Button Generator
115596.description:
This Smart Button Generator enhances your design workflow by allowing you to create fully customizable buttons with robust prototyping features. It includes all the necessary settings to design interactive buttons, complete with transitions and hover effects. Key features of the plugin include:


  1. Icon Support: Easily add icons to your buttons with customizable size and positioning (left or right).


  1. Padding & Spacing: Fine-tune padding for top, bottom, left, and right, and adjust spacing between text and icons.


  1. Responsive Sizing: Choose from fixed, fill, or auto options for width and height to make your buttons adaptable to any layout.


  1. Color Customization: Define custom colors for different button states (main, hover, focus, pressed, disabled) to maintain consistency in your design system.

  3. Borders & Shadows: Customize border radius and shadow effects to add depth and emphasis to your buttons.


  1. Font Settings: Select font family, size, and weight to ensure the button’s text matches your brand's typography.


  1. Text Options: Easily toggle button text on or off with customizable content.


  1. Stroke & Color Enablement: Control stroke and color settings for enhanced visual styling.


Prototyping Features:


  1. State Transitions: Link buttons to different screens or actions based on their states, such as transitioning from normal to hover or focused, providing a dynamic experience.


  1. Interactive Prototypes: Use the plugin’s built-in prototyping tools to create smooth, clickable interactions directly within Figma, giving you full control over the button’s behavior in your prototype.


  1. Hover & Click Effects: Define specific actions triggered by hover and click, making it easy to demonstrate how buttons will behave in an interactive environment.


  1. Dynamic Previews: Preview button interactions directly in your Figma prototype, ensuring that each state works seamlessly and creating a smooth user experience.
115596.tagline: Craft Interactive Buttons with Precision – Elevate Your Prototypes, Simplify Your Workflow!

plugins.name: Ad Lib(s)
plugins.description:
Find out if your library components are used, in a list of design files.


1. How does it work? 


  1. First, go to your Figma settings and get a personal access token (aka a key which enables you, and only you, to communicate with your files),
  2. Then, copy / paste the links of both the library and the design files you want to inspect (those are the same links you use when your share a file, using the "Share" button)
  3. After a while, you should then see a list of all instances found in your design file, which components are used, and which aren't. You can click on a component, in order to locate it in your library file (to do so, you must launch this plugin in your library file)


2. Notes 


  • Please note that your personal token won't be shared or used in any way.
  • This plugin doesn't modify anything in your design (it only inspects, nothing more)
  • You need to be a least a member of a Team, otherwise you can't really use librairies, and this plugin won't be useful
  • All the files you can inspect must be created by you, or come from a Team you're a member of
  • The bigger the files, the longer you'll have to wait ! So, please be patient sometimes :)


If you find bugs, possible improvements, please feel free to contact me.

plugins.name: Symbl — Your Ultimate Symbol Library
plugins.description:
About the Project

This project is a platform designed for easy searching, copying, and using special symbols, emojis, and flags. It is aimed at designers, developers, content creators, and anyone looking to make their projects more expressive and unique.


Project Goal

Our goal is to create a convenient and functional tool that helps users quickly find and apply symbols, emojis, and flags without the need to search for them across multiple sources. We aim to make the copy-and-paste process as simple as possible while ensuring the content remains accessible and useful.


Mission

Our mission is to provide users with a high-quality, structured, and constantly updated catalog of symbols, emojis, and flags that can be easily integrated into web design, social media, documents, and programming. We believe that even small visual details can make communication clearer, more creative, and more engaging.


Key Features

Extensive Symbol Library — From standard HTML symbols to rare characters and emojis.

One-Click Copying — A fast and efficient copy-and-paste system.

Responsive Design — The platform works seamlessly across all devices.

SEO Optimization — Unique content and an easy search system for various needs.

Regular Updates — We continuously add new symbols and features.


Future of the Project

Our future plans include expanding the symbol collection, adding new tools for easier content management, improving the user interface, and integrating with different platforms. We strive to make this platform the ultimate resource for everyone who values high-quality symbols and emojis.

accepted.name: Revend Group
accepted.description: We organize design processes, accelerate the product's time to market and manage projects from the beginning to the final approval.

plugins.name: Copy text with HTML tags
plugins.description:
How to get started?

Open the plugin and select a text box in your Figma file. Then, watch the text in the plugin window transform into semantically tagged text ready to be copied into your code editor.


Multiple styles supported

Currently the plugin supports bold, italic and underlined text styles. Note: Font weights such as SemiBold and Black will not be picked up as bold by this plugin. 


Plus... line breaks

There is also the ability replace line breaks with the <br> tag.


Only use the tags right for your project

You have the ability to customise your experience - simply select ‘Show options’ and select/deselect the formatting conditions appropriate for your project.


New addition - Color!

You can now get the in-line styling for text colors. Note that this segment of text will be added to a span, and the most common color in the selection will not be considered 'special' and therefore will be ignored.


New addition - Links!

Links will now be surfaced through this plugin, using <a href=""> syntax.


~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

☕️ If you love this plugin and would like to support me, you can buy me a coffee at: https://buymeacoffee.com/figmargaux
plugins.tagline: Easily transform Figma text into plug-and-play styled text for your next project's code base

plugins.name: Palette lap
plugins.description:
[From.Red]

This Figma plugin leverages OKLCH and APCA color system to automatically generate color palettes for your designs. Take the guesswork out of color coordination and easily get professional, theory-based palettes.


Usage:

  1. Set the Hue - not just red, any hue can be used
  2. Adjust Chroma - 0.5 is max saturation, try 0.01 for muted neutrals
  3. Name the color Variables with custom token names


Result:

  1. Generate 0/1/2/3...97/98/99/100 levels
  2. Generate variables, like "palette/hero/50"
plugins.tagline: Generate Harmonious Color Palettes  based on OKLCH and APCA.

plugins.name: Codia AI Office: Import Office File to Editable Figma
plugins.description:
Simplify Your Design Workflow with the Office to Editable Figma Plugin——The ideal solution for quickly converting your Office files into fully editable Figma layers. This tool enhances efficiency, precision, and security when transitioning from Office to Figma.


Key Features and Advantages


Fast Conversion

Instantly import your Office files into Figma with minimal loading times, speeding up your design process without sacrificing quality.


Fully Editable Layers

Every element from your Office file is converted into fully editable layers in Figma, ensuring you have complete control over adjustments and iterations.


High Compatibility & Perfect Conversion

Enjoy seamless compatibility between Office and Figma. The plugin ensures that all your design elements, including fonts, effects, and layer structures, are perfectly preserved during the transition.


Privacy Protection

Your files are handled securely throughout the import process, ensuring that your designs remain private and protected.


Supports Multiple Office Formats

Convert a wide range of Office file formats, including .doc / .docx / .docm / .dotx / .dot / .ppt / .pptx / .pptm / .pps / .ppsx / .pot / .potx / .odp / .pages / .key / .wps / .odt / .wpd / .abw / .xls / .xlsx / .xlsb / .xlsm / .xlt / .xltm / .xltx / .csv / .ods, ensuring flexibility across different document types.


Streamline Your Design Process

Using the Office to Editable Figma Plugin will revolutionize your workflow, saving you valuable time and effort. Instead of manually recreating designs in Figma or struggling with compatibility issues, this plugin automates the process, delivering pixel-perfect conversions with full layer editability.


Whether you’re part of a team collaborating on projects or working solo, the ability to instantly convert Office files ensures smoother design handoffs and iterations. With fast, accurate, and secure file conversions, you can focus more on creativity and collaboration, knowing your designs are perfectly preserved across platforms.


Call to Action☎️

For support issues: Slack Twitter Email Codia.AI

69306.name: Bueno Drops
69306.description:
Bueno Drops is the easiest way to turn your artworks into digital collectibles (NFTs) in under a minute, all without needing to write a single line of code. With just a few clicks, you can convert your artboards into digital art, tickets, memberships, or digital gifts.


🧑‍🎨 For creators of all levels!

Whether you're a seasoned artist or just starting out, our plugin simplifies the entire process so you can focus on what you do best – creating!


♾️ Choose your ideal drop type

  • Open Edition: Drop your collectibles with ease and confidence, featuring an unlimited supply and a scheduled end date.
  • Limited Edition: Add an extra layer of uniqueness to your drops with a fixed number of redeemable collectibles.


👾 Why Bueno Drops?

It's a new way to monetize your art, build a loyal community, and showcase your unique style.

plugins.name: GlassForge
plugins.description:
GlassForge is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you create stunning Glassmorphism effects effortlessly. Adjust blur amount, background opacity, fill color, and border styles to achieve the perfect frosted glass look. Live Preview ensures you see changes instantly—no guesswork!


🔹 Features:

✔ Live Preview – See changes in real time!

✔ Adjustable Blur Amount (px)

✔ Customizable Background Opacity (%)

✔ Choose Fill & Border Colors

✔ Set Border Width & Opacity

✔ One-Click Glass Effect Application


Add depth and modern aesthetics to your UI/UX designs in seconds! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly apply stunning Glassmorphism effects to your designs
